subject: Re: My EVP & ITC experimentation systems tour
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Andy,

I have mostly worked with the white noise, when I insert any type 
noise.  Lately I've been going "noiseless" and just letting the audio 
snippets come through... but when I do use it, I like the white.

I guess because there is such a history with EVP and white noise.  
They are like a team from way back.  So many EVP pioneers used it.

Good idea you have with the DVD and looping track.  Any way you can 
insert the noise is helpful.
I haven't used any brown or red... how is that working for you?

And thanks for the kind words...
- Mike
